ReversiBoard

Class ReversiBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReversiBoard.ReversiBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ReversiBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    File: ReversiBoard.java This class that captures the row, column, and color of a move that the user played.
    Author:
    Benhur J. Tadiparti tadiparti@email.arizona.edu, Andrew Raftovich araftovich@email.arizona.edu
    See Also:

      • updateTokenCounter

        public void updateTokenCounter(javafx.scene.text.Text gameText,
                               int whiteTokens,
                               int blackTokens)
        Updates the text on the GUI indicating the total score.
        Parameters:
        gameText - JavaFX Text object containing the game score.
        whiteTokens - Total white tokens on screen.
        blackTokens - Total black tokens on screen.
